title: Shingiin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Defend. They become innocent for all purposes. Then choose a player to Accuse. They become suspicious for all purposes. Defense and Accusations last until you change them.
- When a player you Accused or Defended is hanged, you roleblock all town players who voted guilty.
- Accused and Defended players' wills are cleaned upon death and their role is not revealed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional kill
- Factional chat
- Can skip your night to convert into a Yakuza Boss or Yakuza Killing, if there are no members of those subalignments.
- Cannot spawn regularly. Must be converted into.
